author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

  * Remove the `RooFit::Range()` argument to `fitTo`. It was redundant because the range was the same as the one used to define the `InvMass` variable to begin with. See the current like 171 in `DiMuonMassBiasClient.cc`:
    ```C++
    RooRealVar InvMass("InvMass", "di-muon mass M(#mu^{+}#mu^{-}) [GeV]", xmin, xmax);
    ```

  * Remove `RooFit::Save()` argument, which was not necessary because the return value of `fitTo` was not used anyway, and the `Save()` argument only affects that.

  * Fix memory leak where a RooPlot object created by `frame()` was not deleted.
title: RooFit-related fixes in DiMuonMassBiasClient
